name: Telecube (Remake)
description:
The goal is simple. Get the most points by dodging or destroying obstacles while collecting coins in an infinite setting.

To dodge, our protagonist has the ability to transport himself to the top of the screen.

To attack, we have a cannon at our disposal. You will be rewarded for using it, as destroying enemies generates extra score.

The game saves the maximum score to be able to try to beat it.

It comes in 2 languages: Spanish and English. You can change the language at any time.

If you want to remove or regulate the volume of music or sound effects, it can be done perfectly from the options menu.

To attack, we have a cannon at our disposal. You will be rewarded for using it, as destroying enemies generates extra score.
